integerPropertyWithDefault.description: An integer property with a default value.

numberPropertyWithDefault.description: A number property with a default value.

stringPropertyWithDefault.description: A string property with a default value.

booleanPropertyWithTrueDefault.description: A Boolean property with a true default value.

booleanPropertyWithFalseDefault.description: A Boolean property with a false default value.

enumeratedPropertyWithDefault.description: An enumerated property with a default value.

arrayOfRefProp.description: An array of a cloneable type.

dictionaryWithPrimitiveSchemaProp.description: A dictionary property whose values are defined by a primitive additionalProperties schema.

dictionaryWithObjectSchemaProp.description: A dictionary property whose values are defined by an object-valued additionalProperties schema.

dictionaryWithObjectArraySchemaProp.description: A dictionary property whose values are defined by an array-of-object-valued additionalProperties schema.

dictionaryWithUriKeyProp.description: A dictionary property whose keys are Uris.

dictionaryWithHintedValueProp.description: A dictionary property whose value type is hinted.
